entry.title: Welcome SPRING with a sweet bang!
entry.summary:
Winter is on its way out and Candy Funhouse is bringing in SPRING with a sweet bang! Have you tried these special sweet and salty munchie treats yet? Go ahead, check 'em out:

More
entry.content:
Winter is on its way out and Candy Funhouse is bringing in Spring with a sweet bang! Have you tried these tasty sweet treats yet? 

Oh yes, Winter has been a long one, and through these challenging Canadian c-cc-cold winters we sure can use some sweet pick-me-up's! Good news: Spring is finally here! How are you going to celebrate? 

Spring means Easter time chocolate egg FUN!

Candy Funhouse has the largest selection of Easter chocolate eggs in Canada – not just to celebrate Easter, of course, but to bring in Spring with a tasty treat! You deserve it, your family deserves it, and it makes for a heck of a lot of fun too, since they have a special timeless toy inside! Check out the Reese Easter Egg ('cause everyone loves its peanut-butter goodness!), Cadbury's Oreo Egg (it's soo yummy and gooey good inside!), and let's not forget the ones you can hide everywhere: These Kit Kat Hide Me Eggs that are individually wrapped and DELICIOUSLY tasting! 

Candy Funhouse also carries the Disney Minnie Mouse Chocolate Eggs for Mickey + Minnie fans, NHL Chocolate eggs for the sports fanatic, Barbie, Unicorn, Frozen, Kung-Fu Panda, Regal Academy, Toy Story, and sooo many more including the traditional Kinder Surprise! Check 'em out [HERE] and order your selection of candy and chocolate online today!

Have a crunchy snack while you're gardening!

We know that tons of Candy Funhouse customers are gardening green thumbs who are itching to get going on the garden – if that's you, don't forget to check out Candy Funhouse's huge selection of crunchy munchie snacks that'll keep your hunger at bay while you finish planting those seedlings! 

Select from Candy Funhouse's huge munchie options of snacks online, like the Pringles variety of Scorchin' hot Cheddar and BBQ varieties, Wavy Fire Roasted Jalapeño and Applewood Smoked Pringles, or Screamin' Dill Pickle! There are so many varieties you can combine and create your own flavour combos!

See the Pringle varieties [HERE]. 

Special Springtime Game Snacks - make 'em CHEETOS!

There's of course a TON of sweet + salty crunchy munchies that Candy Funhouse has online for you to order now that you'll be spending more time outdoors and will most definitely need a snacky-munchie-salty treat to fill that gap between meals.

Why not try the AMAZING new Cheetos Pop Crunch Mix that is so savoury, crunchy and cheese all rolled into one! 

Nestle's Bruncha Crunch Theatre Pack packs a punch of goodness without the high calories! At only 180 calories per serving, they'll have you sweetly munching on bunches of delicious milk chocolate filled with crispy rice bits.  Too good to pass up!

Maybe you feel like having a hot crunchy snack alongside a cold one? These Cheetos Xxtra Flamin' Hot Crunchy snacks will challenge your tastebuds with a super hot cheese taste that is typical of Cheetos! Go ahead... Candy Funhouse challenges you to order them online today!

Spring means SWEETS!

So you're in the mood for something sweet after a long day of walking outdoors in the most amazing Springtime weather, right? Our team at Candy Funhouse loves these Snickers Crunchy Peanut Butter Squared bars, the MegaLoad Caramel Crunch with its king size goodness, these incredible Violet Crumble Candy Bars from Australia ("it's the way it shatters that matters!"), and back from the 1990's it's the amazing Twix Cookies & Creme, because it's already been 30 years and we need more!

Springtime Mix – It's Spring after all!

If in doubt, order all your candies, chocolates, chips and snack assortments through Candy Funhouse because you will not see these at your supermarket! And since it's spring and we need to celebrate, don't forget these Dove Dark Chocolate Caramel Assortment Springtime Mix! Taste the silky smooth Dove dark chocolate with a sweet & salty springtime twist from sea salt caramel filling. It's just the thing you've been waiting for to celebrate spring!
.
Any reason is a good reason to celebrate spring, we've been going through so much and waiting for so long, now's the time to get outside and then celebrate with a TREAT! At Candy Funhouse we feel we deserve it... don't you?

entry.title: Top 10 new candy you must try!
entry.summary:
Candy Funhouse has searched the world to find all the newest candy creations for you. Check out our Top 10 new candies you MUST TRY!

More
entry.content:
Candy Funhouse searched the world to find all the newest candy creations, and here's the Top 10 you must try this year!

At Candy Funhouse, we know you like to order your favourite candies and treats online, but there are always new creations coming up for sale online through our site, and this year it's no exception! There are so many goodies that are just too good to pass up and not try out. These selections will make you the most popular one at school, work, and even at home!

In no particular order of preference, here are the Top 10 we selected to share with you, our MUST TRY bunch of sweets!

1. Oreo Lady Gaga Cookies – Limited Edition Release

Inspired by Lady Gaga's latest album, Chromatica, Oreo has done it again with their newest creation: Oreo Lady Gaga Cookies! Each Oreo is coloured pink with a neon green cream centre that tastes just like the original Oreo cookie, except for the vibrant neon green colour! This cookie will have you singing verses as you dip them in a cold delicious glass of milk. Just so YUM! 

2. Sweetbox Collectables Candy Toys

In a world where candy and toys are matched so perfectly for hours of sweet fun and play, Sweetbox has done it again with these collectables that include a toy and fruit gummies to enjoy.  Choose from Kitty Cat, Space Pony, and Fluffies the Dog... or get all three and start your collection!

3. Office Stapler Gummy

Inspired by Jim from NBC's The Office "Pilot" episode, this 'stapler' is stuffed inside a candy jello-wanna-be (a delicious gummy!), this one makes a great gift for anyone who has ever seen The Office, or even as a gag gift for April Fool's Day! 

4. Jelly Belly Rosé Mini 'Wine' Bottles

Celebrate the day's end with a glass of bubbly Jelly Belly beans, all tucked away in this perfect little bottle that reminds you of moments worth celebrating! The non-alcoholic sweet pink beans are gluten/peanut/dairy/fat free, and vegetarian friendly! How fun are these?

5. Doritos 3D Crunch Chili Cheese Nacho

Welcome to the long-awaited return of the 3D Crunch Chili Cheese Nacho chip! These three-dimensional shaped Doritos are puffed up with a hollow centre and a hearty chili cheese nacho flavour that is too good not to try. As must online order from Candy Funhouse today!

6. Mars Chocolate Spread

Calling all chocolate lovers! Imported from Germany, this new choco spread by Mars is out of this world! Made with natural chocolate and milk, it's complemented by delicious caramel and tastes just like you're eating a real Mars bar. Spread it on toast, cakes, or even a crunchy apple.

7. Ritz Cheese Crispers

Here's something for those with the munchies who are craving something crunchy and cheesie-licious! These oven-baked potato and wheat chips are made with real cheese; available in Cheddar Cheese flavour, or Four Cheese & Herb with a nice light taste and full crunch.

 

8. Jelly Belly Mint Chocolate Truffles

Here's a new and innovative candy from Jelly Belly that's just so deserving of new attention! These special edition Mint Chocolate Truffles from Jelly Belly are a classic combination of chocolate and mint: A delicious chocolate filled with the just the right amount of mint that pops in your mouth with flavour. A must try for Candy Funhouse's new 2021 collection!

9. GoLightly Sugar-free

Choose from GoLightly Sugar Free assorted fruit chews, vanilla caramels or Starlight Mints, these are sure to become favourites! They are a sweetened with sugar alcohols and Splenda for a sugar-free choice. Check out the varieties and order one... or all!

10. Ganong Chicken Bones Bites

This is an oldie but super-goodie! The original Chicken Bones, a popular candy in Atlantic Canada since the late 19th century, has made a comeback; a spicy cinnamon flavoured candy with the bittersweet chocolate flavour that is luscious and an explosion for the taste buds! 

Candy Funhouse has a huge collection of new candies you can order online for quick delivery of the freshest candies, chocolates, treats and munchies. For more of what you really "must try" this year, check out the whole new collection we have in store for you [HERE]! You won't be disappointed!

Which one of these do you want to try first? Share your comments below!

entry.title: March Break: Let's Make it Happen!
entry.summary:
March Break is coming up and it's a great time to spend some quality time with the family. Here are some ideas on how to make it even more special – even while staying safely at home!

More
entry.content:
How to make March Break happen? Order candy online for special delivery from Candy Funhouse, of course!

March Break is coming up and it's a great time to spend some quality time with the family. Candy Funhouse shares some ideas on how to make it even more special – even while staying safely at home!

 

MARCH BREAK IS COMING!

Times may have changed, but people have not. After working so hard we all need a vacation, even if that means a Staycation! Time off work, time to catch up on some Netflix, maybe dust off the winter blues and start thinking of springtime ahead... with candy by your side!

Here are some ways to make March Break happen for the whole family:

  1. Game night. Every night!  Schedule a game night with your family, and make your games revolve around candy. Our Candy Funhouse team put together this candy game blog [HERE] with lots of sweet ideas to tie in with. Everyone loves a good game night, schedule it in!


  2. March Break around the world. Pick a country or region and dress up with that theme... One country per day = 7 days of fun! Make your candy online purchase selection match the different countries you're picking. For example, on "Mexican Day" you can have a taco dinner night, then Doritos 3D Crunch Chili Cheese Nacho Chips while watching a Mexican film, followed by efrutti Mexican Dinner gummies!  Candy Funhouse has online candy sales from Japan, British candy, Australian candy, and of course our very own Canadian candy - and this is cause for celebration!


  3. Celebrate Spring. March 20th is the first day of spring, so why not celebrate it early and get the family going on springtime fun-time? You can get the smaller kiddoes planting some seeds and for every seed they plant they get a special treat! On another day, take the kids on a drive to look at some of the early blooms surrounding the neighbourhood, like daffodils, crocuses and tulips - then they can match the colours they see with a colourful candy! Here are some favourites, including Australia's Lifesaver Fruit Tingles, Skittles Tropical candies, Jelly Belly Kids Mix, or even Bigs Cheese Burger sunflower seeds, which they'll love!



  4. Gift them a March Break Gift Set! When all else fails, make family, neighbours and friends feel special by ordering them a gift basket online! Candy Funhouse has a variety of sweet gift baskets for any taste, like the Disney Frozen 2 Gift Basket for smaller children, PEZ Star Wars Mandalorian Twin Pack gift set for the Star Wars aficionado, and even the delicious Amish Country Popcorn Gift Set, perfect for any family movie night!


Sometimes all it takes is one person in the family to make a difference. Be the person in your family that makes March Break happen - plan ahead, order your candy online through Candy Funhouse now so that each person in your family will receive their unique sweet package of goodies to celebrate March Break and make it memorable!

What are you doing this March Break? Share with us your ideas for making it memorable! Comment below:

entry.title: New year = new candy!
entry.summary:
It's a new year, and Candy Funhouse has a whole new line of sweet candy and treats to get your year off to a good start! Here are some samples that you probably haven't heard of.

More
entry.content:
Let's start the year off right! Did you forget to send a special gift for someone on Christmas? We hear you, and we got you covered! At Candy Funhouse, we believe it’s never too late to send a candy gift.

Call it a “New Years Gift” – candy is perfect to cheer someone up and really, what a great way to start the new year!

For those who are going back to school after the Holidays, or back to work, there is a great way to feel good about it all: CANDY!

 

New Year = New Candy

Be the hero that goes back to work or school by bringing in the new stuff. You know, the sweet and crunchy treats that nobody’s seen or heard of before, but everyone wants! You’ll be the popular one with these candies when you get your online candy delivered by Candy Funhouse!

 

Sour Punch Apple Straws

You know the brand, and this apple-flavoured one is addictively good! Get the apple flavoured and the grape straws too, just in case you want to share with your co-workers.

 

Lindt Lindor Neapolitan Limited Edition

Now we KNOW you like Lindor, and you probably didn’t have enough of them through the winter, so now’s your chance to try this limited edition neapolitan-inspired flavour of chocolate, vanilla, and strawberry. Bite sized, melt-in-your mouth indulgence that’ll make you think twice about sharing with others. Check ‘em out!

 

Cookie Pop OREO Popcorn

Say, what?? These limited-time-only snacks are something else, and you MUST try them! Yummy popcorn that is drizzled with a light vanilla coating and OREO cookie crumbles = Irresistible!

 

SweetTARTS Ropes Watermelon Berry Collision

If there is a flavour Candy Funhouse gets ordered a LOT of, it’s gotta be watermelon! These ropes are soft and chewy with a fruity flavour and soft texture that is addicting. Eating just one of them is enough to cheer anyone up – and have them asking for more!

 

Reese’s Snack Cake

WHOA, this one is new, delicious, super good, and you can't miss it!! You just can’t be expected to go back to work and just sit there snack-less, right? These are a first for Reese’s and at Candy Funhouse we think they’ve won the battle of the munchies with it! Perfect to satisfy that mid-morning snack craving – whether at work or at home.

 

 

Especially sweet gifts for those you forgot!

Did you forget to get a gift for someone at work? Are you seeing a teacher for the first time in a long time? If there’s someone you forgot to gift for, try one of these new candy releases that are sweet and a gift all rolled into one. We got Star Wars themed candy, crunchy treats, even popcorn and gift sets.

Click [HERE] to see all our new candy collection you can order online!

A new year is a good thing: A brand new start and a blank slate for making good things happen – and it’s all better with candy by your side! Don’t you deserve a special treat? Something that’s just for you to enjoy? Go for it, order your candy online from Candy Funhouse now and let’s have you enjoy the new year in sweet sweet style!

PS: Don’t forget to order your candy online for Valentine’s Day now too!

Which new candy are you looking forward to trying? Post your comments below:

entry.title: Bring in the New Year with Candy Games!
entry.summary:
What will you do to make this New Year Celebration memorable? Play with your food, of course! Here's some fun candy games for the whole gang at home.

More
entry.content:
Celebrating the New Year should be a feel-good thing, right? Especially if you’ve had a challenging year, like many of us have! This New Year, make it super special while staying safe and enjoying the time with your loved ones. How do we do that at Candy Funhouse? With candy, of course!

Many of us love going out for New Year, having parties, or hosting get-togethers with our besties, for New Year. If this is not a possibility, why not stay safe and cozy at home and play some candy games?

At Candy Funhouse, we know that everyone loves playing games; it’s an easy way to pass the time while having fun, and way better for quality time rather than everyone spending it on their own phone. Especially for events like New Year, it’s important to spend the time together, doing things that are fun, and making it memorable.

Here are some ideas for you to play some fun candy games, whether you're looking for kids candy games, adult candy games, or candy games for the whole family to enjoy:

 

KIDS CANDY GAMES

If you’re staying at home with young kids, there are many games you can play using candy. They’ll love these because they’re not only fun, but they get to eat the candy too!

“Sweet Tac Toe”

Set up a board with a Tic Tac Toe drawn on it, and use Reese’s Pieces Big Cups (39g) for one player, and York Peppermint Pattie (39g) for the other player. In this version, the winner gets to take a bite out of each candy that has crossed – not eat the whole thing at once (39g is a lot… they’re quite large!). Then keep taking tuns until someone finishes their candy bar first! You can also play with other candies like Hershey’s Kisses, and every player gets a different coloured foil – a great way to try the new flavours too, like Mint Kisses and Lava Cake Dark Chocolate Kisses!

 

“Twizzlers Nibs Building Challenge”

– Photo courtesy of our friends at FrogsAndSnailsAndPuppyDogTail.com

These guys really have it together, and what a great idea this is! Jaime is a mother of three high-energy boys, who loves creating and crafting together. This game is one of her mastermind ideas and we’re loving it! You can use a few packets of Twizzlers Nibs candy and use toothpicks to connect them, building challenging forts, ‘cars’ and roads for a whole lotta fun!

You can have the kids (or you!) use both cherry and dark licorice Twizzlers Nibs, and get the multi-coloured toothpicks to connect them. How fun! Check out the varieties Candy Funhouse has, HERE. 

 

ADULT CANDY GAMES

At Candy Funhouse, we already know what happens when you mix Mentos with Coca Cola… But there are better ways to have fun and get to actually EAT the candy you’re playing with! How about we share a couple of ideas with you for New Year’s?

“Marshies Picking Game” 

Use chopsticks and small marshmallows like Marshies Strawberry or Chocolate/Vanilla, or Mango flavours (they’re just so good, and there are so many flavours!). Set the timer and see who gets to pick more Marshies with their toothpicks… The winner has to stuff all the ones they picked into their mouth at once, while the rest of you watch and take selfies! Order your candy Marshies online HERE!

 

“Suck ‘em Sweet”

This game can also use small marshmallows, M&Ms or Smarties (or all of them together in a bowl!). Every player gets a bowl of candies, and an empty bowl. The object of the game is to use a straw to suck one candy at a time from the candy bowl, onto the empty candy bowl, using a timer (you can use the one on your phone). The fastest person to get them all to the empty bowl wins! What do they win? That’s up to the organizer of course… Maybe it’s a special treat, or something more adult-like… or maybe they get to eat everyone’s treats!

(Thanks to Sophie’s World for the fun photo... check out the full video HERE!)

 

“Truth or Sweet”

Yes, it’s kind of like Truth or Dare but where the dare is a treat. The object of the game is to get yourself a Pantry Size jug of M&M’s, and divvy up some between each player – everyone gets their own paper cup of them, about a large handful is good. Next, you need to decide what each colour means, for example: The red ones will be a ‘dare’, the blue ones will be a kiss or a hug; the yellow ones will be a ‘truth’, and so on… You can even play a fun strip-candy game, or make them all dares! Each player takes a turn clockwise, picking a colour from their opponent’s candy cup, doing the truth or dare, and enjoying their candy! 

When someone asks you, “what did you do for New Year?” what are you going to say? Make sure it’s a fun thing, because we all need a wonderful celebration to bring in a New Year full of hope, happiness, and health... And have fun with candy!

Now go ahead and start picking your candy from Candy Funhouse’s huge selection, buy your candy online in Canada, select your games, and plan an evening that will be memorable!

What will you do this New Year? Let our team at Candy Funhouse know in the comments below:
